beforeHooks.title: "before each" hook
beforeHooks.fullTitle: Contract: AbstractStorage "before each" hook
beforeHooks.code:
storage = await AbstractStorage.new()
appInit = await ApplicationMockInit.new().should.be.fulfilled
appInit.should.not.eq(null)
appInitCalldata = '0xe1c7392a' // bytes4(keccak256("init()"));

afterHooks.title: "after each" hook: after test
afterHooks.fullTitle: Contract: AbstractStorage "after each" hook: after test

suites.title: when the given calldata is valid for the app init function

beforeHooks.title: "before each" hook for "should emit an ApplicationInitialized event"
beforeHooks.fullTitle: Contract: AbstractStorage #initAndFinalize when the given calldata is valid for the app init function "before each" hook for "should emit an ApplicationInitialized event"
beforeHooks.code:
events = await storage.initAndFinalize(appUpdater, false, appInit.address, appInitCalldata, []).should.be.fulfilled.then((tx) => {
    return tx.logs
})
events.should.not.eq(null)
events.length.should.eq(2)
appInitializedEvent = events[0]
appFinalizedEvent = events[1]

err.message: AssertionError: expected promise to be fulfilled but it was rejected with 'Error: VM Exception while processing transaction: revert'
err.estack: AssertionError: expected promise to be fulfilled but it was rejected with 'Error: VM Exception while processing transaction: revert'

tests.title: should emit an ApplicationInitialized event
tests.fullTitle: Contract: AbstractStorage #initAndFinalize when the given calldata is valid for the app init function should emit an ApplicationInitialized event

tests.title: should emit an ApplicationFinalization event
tests.fullTitle: Contract: AbstractStorage #initAndFinalize when the given calldata is valid for the app init function should emit an ApplicationFinalization event

tests.title: should return the exec id of the initialized application
tests.fullTitle: Contract: AbstractStorage #initAndFinalize when the given calldata is valid for the app init function should return the exec id of the initialized application
tests.code:
let execId = await storage.initAndFinalize(appUpdater, false, appInit.address, appInitCalldata, []).should.be.fulfilled
execId.should.not.eq(null)

tests.title: should include an indexed exec id for the initialized application
tests.fullTitle: Contract: AbstractStorage #initAndFinalize when the given calldata is valid for the app init function ApplicationInitialized event should include an indexed exec id for the initialized application

tests.title: should include an indexed exec id for the finalized application

suites.title: when the given calldata is invalid for the app init function

tests.title: should revert the tx
tests.fullTitle: Contract: AbstractStorage #initAndFinalize when the given calldata is invalid for the app init function should revert the tx
tests.code:
let invalidCalldata = '' // should be, at a minimum, bytes4(keccak256("init()")) for default application initializer
await storage.initAndFinalize(appUpdater, false, appInit.address, invalidCalldata, []).should.be.rejectedWith(exports.EVM_ERR_REVERT)

beforeHooks.title: "before each" hook for "should return the storage address of the initialized application"
beforeHooks.fullTitle: Contract: ScriptExec application context "before each" hook for "should return the storage address of the initialized application"
beforeHooks.code:
appInit = await ApplicationMockInit.new().should.be.fulfilled
appInit.should.not.eq(null)
appInitCalldata = '0xe1c7392a' // bytes4(keccak256("init()"));
appExecId = await storage.initAndFinalize(updater, appPayable, appInit.address, appInitCalldata, appAllowed).should.be.fulfilled // proper initialization via RegistryStorage
appExecId.should.not.eq(null)
appInitInfo = await storage.getAppInitInfo(registryExecId, provider, appName)
appInitInfo.should.not.eq(null)

suites.title: when the app has been initialized properly via registry storage
when the given calldata is valid for the app init function

beforeHooks.title: "before each" hook
beforeHooks.fullTitle: Contract: ScriptExec application context #initAppInstance when the app has been initialized properly via registry storage when the given calldata is valid for the app init function "before each" hook
beforeHooks.code:
let { retvals } = await scriptExec.initAppInstance(appName, appPayable, appInitCalldata).should.be.fulfilled
console.log(retvals)
retvals.should.not.eq(null)
retvals.length.should.be.eq(3)
appStorage = retvals[0]
appVersion = retvals[1]
appExecId = retvals[2]
